Notes: Created KwitansiCrmController with index/apiList/apiStats/apiStore/apiShow/apiUpdate/apiDelete/apiBulkDelete. Added view route kwitansi-v1 and API prefix group.

Full CRUD UI: stats cards (total/nominal/today), search + date filter, sortable table with pagination, create/edit modal, delete confirm modal, bulk delete, print PDF link, Alpine.js component with fetch-based API calls.
Updated Kwitansi v1 link from coming-soon to route('kwitansi-v1.index'). Added active state support with auto-open on kwitansi-v1/kwitansi-v2. Added active indicator dot.
